titles.title: Sustainable Water Infrastructure Investment Act of 2016
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the volume cap for private activity bonds shall not apply to bonds for facilities for the furnishing of water and sewage facilities.
Sustainable Water Infrastructure Investment Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Sustainable Water Infrastructure Investment Act of 2016
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from state volume caps tax-exempt facility bonds for sewage and water supply facilities.
